quote: A mother’s love for her child is like nothing else in the world. It knows no aw, no pity, it dares all things and crushes down remorselessly all that stands in its path.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don’t go according to any rules. They’re not like aches or wounds, they’re more like splits in the skin that won’t heal because there’s not enough material.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: You can kiss your family and friends good-bye and put miles between you, but at the same time you carry them with you in your heart, your mind, your stomach, because you do not just live in a world but a world lives in you.
author: Frederick Buechner

quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one’s own relations.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: When I was a boy of fourteen, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be twenty-one, I was astonished at how much the old man had learned in seven years.
author: Mark Twain

quote: No man has ever lived that had enough of children’s gratitude or woman’s love.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
author: Princess Diana

quote: When she can’t bring me to heal with scolding, she bends me to shape with guilt.
author: Libba Bray

quote: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
author: Mark V. Olsen

quote: There’s nothing that makes you more insane than family. Or more happy. Or more exasperated. Or more… secure.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
author: David Ogden Stiers

quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs, and returns home to find it.
author: George Moore

quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching – –  they are your family.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Govern a family as you would cook a small fish – very gently.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Spare the rod and spoil the child – that is true. But, beside the rod, keep an apple to give him when he has done well.
author: Martin Luther

quote: One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family.
author: Jonathan Foer

quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: John Bowring

quote: Family is not an important thing, it’s everything.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
author: Jane Howard

quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life.
author: Richard Bach

quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: My family comes first. Maybe that’s what makes me different from other guys.
author: Bobby Darin

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close- knit family in another city.
author: George Burns

quote: To understand your parents’ love, you must raise children yourself.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: The homemaker has the ultimate career. All other careers exist for one purpose only –  and that is to support the ultimate career.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: We do not develop habits of genuine love automatically. We learn by watching effective role models – most specifically by observing how our parents express love for each other day in and day out.
author: Josh McDowell

quote: Is this what family is like: the feeling that everyone’s connected, that with one piece missing, the whole thing’s broken?
author: Trenton Lee Stewart

quote: Writers will happen in the best of families.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: One’s family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I’ll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who’ll be with me will be my family.
author: Robert Byrd

quote: Family life is too intimate to be preserved by the spirit of justice. It can be sustained by a spirit of love which goes beyond justice.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: we must take care of our families wherever we find them.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: All families are psychotic. Everybody has basically the same family –  it’s just reconfigured slightly different from one to the next.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When trouble comes, it’s your family that supports you.
author: Guy Lafleur

quote: This was the trouble with families. Like invidious doctors, they knew just where it hurt.
author: Arundhati Roy

quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
author: Confucius

quote: He that raises a large family does, indeed, while he lives to observe them, stand a broader mark for sorrow; but then he stands a broader mark for pleasure too.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Cherish your human connections – your relationships with friends and family.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: That’s what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you’re not so lovable.
author: Deb Caletti

quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: Strangers are just family you have yet to come to know.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: There’s nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
author: Willie Stargell

quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life!
author: Albert Einstein

quote: No one’s family is normal. Normalcy is a lie invented by advertising agencies to make the rest of us feel inferior.
author: Calire LaZebnik

quote: You are born into your family and your family is born into you. No returns. No exchanges.
author: Elizabeth Berg

quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there any more.
author: Robin Hobb
